responsibilities: Collaborate with domain experts to understand business needs and translate them into clear and effective LLM prompts.
Develop, test, and refine prompts for a variety of use cases, ensuring high accuracy and relevance in generated outputs.
Work closely with software developers to integrate LLM solutions into existing or new applications.
Contribute to the development of a scalable framework for prompt engineering, promoting reuse and knowledge sharing across different business units.
Assist in gathering and analyzing user feedback to continually improve prompt effectiveness.
Stay up-to-date with advancements in LLM technology and contribute to strategic decisions on tool and platform selection.
Document prompt engineering processes, best practices, and use case outcomes to build a comprehensive knowledge base.
qualifications: Proficiency in Python or other programming languages commonly used in AI/ML development.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and adapt to changing project requirements.
Familiarity with tools such as OpenAI’s GPT models, Hugging Face, etc.
Experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch) and data processing libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy).
Familiarity with version control systems like Git.
analysis:
The job responsibilities clearly indicate involvement with language models (LLMs). The tasks include developing, testing, and refining prompts specifically for LLMs, integrating LLM solutions into applications, and staying updated with advancements in LLM technology. These responsibilities are directly related to working with language models.

The skills section further supports this conclusion. It mentions familiarity with tools such as OpenAI’s GPT models and Hugging Face, which are well-known platforms for working with LLMs. Additionally, proficiency in programming languages used in AI/ML development and experience with machine learning frameworks are relevant to working with generative AI technologies.

Overall, both the responsibilities and skills sections strongly suggest that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
